snippet.title: The Lab Thing trailer
snippet.description:
The lab thing is a first-person survival horror game. Explore a mysterious secret lab and play as the only human left alive. Gather all the scientist's notes about the monster, upgrade backpack items, record information and try to escape before you join the body collection of the lab thing!

Wishlist it on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2605430/The_Lab_Thing/

My website:
https://www.metapolis.games/the-lab-thing
